name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Season 1: Phalanx
summary:
Each season of the game features free content updates, starting with Season 1: Phalanx, named for its new Class.

Season 1: Phalanx features the following free content:
New Class Kit: the combat shield-wielding "Phalanx", with 15 Kit-Specific Perks
4 New Weapons
New Cosmetic Rewards (head accessory, weapon colorways and decals)
